comment._content: Is this the sculptor who did Sitting Bull a few pictures back?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Yes. He is Walter W. Winans: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2162692893/in/p...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Thanks!  We'll add this more complete information to the record next time we update.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: It's interesting that a Google search of the term "Preshtashka" takes us to three pages of references -- but EVERY ONE of them leads back to this photo. I wonder if Bain misunderstood the term?
